meanings.definition: A person who works with metal.
meanings.sent1: The metalworkers in the factory create beautiful sculptures from metal.
meanings.sent2: Metalworkers use tools to shape metal into different forms.
meanings.sent3: The metalworkers decided to have a competition to see who could make the tiniest metal figurine.
meanings.sent4: The metalworkers' hands were as strong as the metal they worked with.
meanings.sent5: The sound of hammers hitting metal echoed through the workshop where the metalworkers toiled.

meanings.definition: Those who specialize in shaping and manipulating metal materials.
meanings.sent1: The skilled metalworkers were able to bend and twist metal with precision.
meanings.sent2: Metalworkers often use heat to soften metal for shaping.
meanings.sent3: The metalworkers joked that they could turn any metal object into a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The metalworkers' expertise turned raw metal into intricate designs.
meanings.sent5: The metalworkers' workshop was filled with the clinks and clanks of metal being worked on.

meanings.definition: Individuals skilled in crafting metal objects.
meanings.sent1: The metalworkers meticulously crafted each piece of jewelry by hand.
meanings.sent2: Metalworkers take pride in their ability to create unique metal pieces.
meanings.sent3: The metalworkers were so talented that they could make metal look like delicate lace.
meanings.sent4: The metalworkers' creativity knew no bounds when it came to crafting metal objects.
meanings.sent5: The metalworkers' dedication to their craft was evident in every metal object they produced.
